description: The Blue Milk Of Tatooine cocktail pays homage to an actual drink called “Bantha Milk” from Star Wars. Don't confuse this boozy mix with Disney's Galaxy' Edge blue milkshakes, which are served in a galaxy far away (or not).This Galactic&nbsp;Piña Colada twist from mixologist Karen Grill of Sassafras Saloon in Los Angeles is a star-studded cocktail. The concoction packs a creamy, citrus-flavored punch with a mix of gin, coconut cream,&nbsp;blue curaçao, vanilla syrup, orgeat syrup, pineapple juice, and lime juice.The aroma of this blue drink is both energizing and flavorful—you’ll want another sip.
